snippet: The price of a gallon of regular has fallen nearly a penny a day over the last four weeks, averaging $3.41 nationwide on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The price of a gallon of regular has fallen nearly a penny a day over the last four weeks, averaging $3.41 nationwide on Tuesday.

headline.main: As Economies Slow, Price of Gas Falls
headline.print_headline: As Economies Slow, Price Of Gas Falls
headline.seo: As Economies Slow, Price of Gas Falls
